Job description:
UX/UI Designer

Full job description
We are looking for a creative problem-solver who can effectively design intuitive and engaging user experiences. As a UI/UX Designer, you will be part of a dynamic and fast-paced environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and other key stakeholders.
Key Responsibilities
Lead the end-to-end product design process, from understanding user needs to delivering high-quality, pixel-perfect designs.
Conduct user research, synthesize insights, and develop wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI designs.
Collaborate with Product Managers, Engineers, and other stakeholders to define and implement innovative product features.
Gather and incorporate feedback to continuously refine and improve designs.
Ensure the usability and accessibility of the product, optimizing designs for user experience and business impact.
Identify effective design patterns and proactively enhance them based on user data and best practices.
Utilize data-driven decision-making to improve design outcomes.
Requirements
Minimum 3 years of experience in UI/UX design or a related field.
Strong visual design expertise, including proficiency in layout, visual hierarchy, and information architecture.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to propose creative and innovative solutions.
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, cross-functional environment.
Deep empathy for users, ensuring design decisions align with customer needs and business objectives.
Strong expertise in Figma, Overflow, and other industry-standard design tools.
Understanding of design processes, usability principles, and data-driven design approaches.
English communication is a must
